General.Name: Planigrupo LATAM S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Planigrupo LATAM, S.A.B. de C.V. designs, builds, operates, manages, and leases shopping centers in Mexico. Planigrupo LATAM, S.A.B. de C.V. was founded in 1975 and is based in Mexico City, Mexico. Planigrupo LATAM, S.A.B. de C.V. operates as a subsidiary of Grupo México UPAS.
General.Address: Avenida Santa fe no-481, Mexico City, DF, Mexico

4.Name: Adrian Araujo Gonzalez
4.Title: Investment Mang. & Head of Investor Relations
